channel.title: My computer :(
channel.description:
ok my idiot of a step dad has been on my computer whilst i was out and i come back to find it packed with spyware/malware :( , i've ran scans with win def,ad-aware,avg ect. and cleared most of it up, but i have a few problems which i cant figure out :(
firstly my windows firewall cant find my virus protection[IMG]http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f88/wixter/m.jpg[/img]
secondly im getting this message saying i have a trogan on my computer, i deleted 5-10 trojans oready with scans ,yet i still get this :( [IMG]http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f88/wixter/urge.jpg[/img]
also im getting a critical error saying my computer is infected :( i click the link and it takes me to this http://www.spyfalcon.com/?aff=264 [IMG]http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f88/wixter/error.jpg[/img]
and when i was typing this i got this pop up :( [IMG]http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f88/wixter/sys.jpg[/img]
im using firefox as ie has changed my homepage and nearly every 2 mins a get an anoying pop up, iv tried everything to try and get rid of these messages, now i was gona try go 2 safe mode and save all my stuff and then re-install xp and all that shit but iv lost my disk, i could just get it from a warez site but id rarther seek help here first , could any1 help me please! id be eternally greatfull :(

item.title: My computer :(
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Hmm yup.

Scroll down on the Free Programs List and download Iolo System Mechanic 6. That is such an awesome program. It will probably fix it for you.

That should solve all your problems. If you want more security help look at this guide.
Solve Security Issues in Windows XP

Hope that helps.

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: My computer :(
item.dc:creator: @afi afi
item.description:
@afi wrote:

you probley have a hijacked browser.

Read full topic

item.title: My computer :(
item.dc:creator: @Coolnoob55 Coolnoob55
item.description:
@Coolnoob55 wrote:

Last 2 errors definitely a fake… When a popup comes saying it reccomends you to get a specific type of anti-vir or whatever, its fake. And try spybot it owns and maybe also “The Cleaner” for trojans. And also try to do a system restore for windows, it “restores” it to a previous day chaning all the registry modifications and crap =\ If your computer is owned, better reformat =\

Read full topic

item.title: My computer :(
item.dc:creator: @wixter wixter
item.description:
@wixter wrote:

thank you,il try bazooka adware and spyware scanner now[br][size=1]Posted at: May 14, 2006, 06:29:48 am[/size][hr]edit:: do u know how id delete things in ie? i start up in safe mode open up ie and type c:\tmp.txt (which i haft to delete) but i dont know how to delete it?

Read full topic

item.title: My computer :(
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Ok, the last two errors are fake, and are part of your spyware problem.

I wrote this guide a while ago to help my friend get rid of his spyware, it may help:

[code]Part 1: Signs of Spyware

~Suspicious Processes~

To check to see if a process is spyware/adware/or other malicious offer, go to:
http://www.liutilities.com/products...processlibrary/

~Strange pop-up Windows~

If you get pop-up windows on a site that you know you doesn’t have adds, you probably have adware/spyware.

~Sluggish System Preformance~

Computer running slow? Spyware may be the culprit.

And the most dangerous sign of sign that you have Spyware is…
Nothing. The best sypware goes completely unnoticed.

Part 2: Getting rid of Spyware
Programs:

Easy Programs:

Adaware: You can purchase it or get the freeware version:

Adaware

adaware: the best FREE Antivirus & Ad Blocker period.

adaware is the Internet’s security and privacy leader. We offer simple, worry-free solutions that enhance your online experience, keeping you connected like never before.

Spybot-Search and Destroy: Freeware:

Spybot Anti-Malware and Antivirus

Home - Spybot Anti-Malware and Antivirus

Spybot offers a unique technology for your security. Far beyond antivirus Spybot searches and destroys unwanted software and protects your privacy.

Expert Programs:

Bazooka Adware and Spyware Scanner:Freeware, shows you what you have and how to get rid of it, so you can do it yourself.
http://www.download.com/Bazooka-Adw...tml?tag=lst-0-6

BrowserSpy: Tells you what your web browser is sending to sites:
http://www.gemal.dk/browserspy/

This isn’t a program, but there is a comprehensive list of many Parasites, with manual instructions for removal:
http://doxdesk.com/parasite/

Part 3:Stopping Spyware Before it Starts:

Installing Spyware Blaster blocks Spyware, Dialers, and other parasites and dangers before they even start. A unique solution:

BrightFort

SpywareBlaster

Prevent the installation of spyware, adware, malware, and more. Free download.

Personal Firewalls:
Zone Alarm:
http://www.zonelabs.com/store/conte...alm_details.jsp
Outpost:
http://www.agnitum.com/download/
Tiny:

tinysoftware.com

- Protect Your PC From Ransomware and Viruses

Protect Your PC From Ransomware and Viruses

Part 4: Fake/Bad/Misleading Spyware Remover Programs:

Spyware Nuker from TrekBlue is made by a spyware company.

WarNet offers an “Ad Remover” but they are parasite creators

Virtual Bouncer from SpywareLabs can execute arbitrary code remotely, and is made by a spyware company.

AdProtector from RedV is adware.

SpyAssault from N-Light installs a Trojan. Avoid anything from “Razor Media”

SpyBlast is a parasite.[/code]

Read full topic
